title.en: Making a Child with a Beast

altTitles.ja-ro: Kemonosama wa Ongaeshi de Haramasetai Ninpu Shussan-hen

altTitles.ja: 獣とオレの子作り着床日記～昔助けた獣に恩返しで種付けされました～
獣様は恩返しで孕ませたい
獣様は恩返しで孕ませたい 妊夫・出産編

altTitles.zh: 野兽与我的造人着床日记～ 被以前救助的野兽以报恩为由播种了～

description.en:
"Are you so happy to conceive my child that you can't restrain yourself?" I'm a playboy, but I get wet when a beast man touches me...!? Yurito, a playboy who attends a veterinary school, is suffering from the idiosyncratic nature of being "avoided and hated by males", whether they are humans or animals. On the other hand, he has a free-spirited sexual life with women, but these women can't help him get rid of the hot aches in his stomach, so he has to do it himself. One night, when he's masturbating, a big, black beast shows up all of a sudden and licks him there!? On top of that, the beast turns into a human and says, "You saved me a long time ago, and to return the favor, you'll conceive my child." After that, the beast who claims to be a god pushes him down and rubs him in the spot that even he can't reach, and it feels so good...!!! (Source: Coolmic)

Vol.1: Kemonosama wa Ongaeshi de Haramasetai
Vol.2: Kemonosama wa Ongaeshi de Haramasetai Ninpu Shussan-hen
